ns0:entry.ns0:title: App-vNext/Polly
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/App-vNext/Polly
Language: c%23
Polly is a .NET resilience and transient-fault-handling library that allows developers to express policies such as Retry, Circuit Breaker, Timeout, Bulkhead Isolation, and Fallback in a fluent and thread-safe manner. From version 6.0.1, Polly targets .NET Standard 1.1 and 2.0+.

ns0:entry.ns0:title: Arcenox-co/TickerQ
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/Arcenox-co/TickerQ
Language: c%23
TickerQ is a fast, reflection-free background task scheduler for .NET ‚Äî built with source generators, EF Core integration, cron + time-based execution, and a real-time dashboard.
